snippet: New legislation would arm returning veterans with information about schools and job training, and curb abuses by aggressive marketers.
abstract: Editorial supports Washington Sen Patty Murray for introducing bill to help provide veterans seeking to enter schools and training programs with the information necessary to make informed decisions; maintains bill will ensure that America's investment in the futures of those who have served is not squandered or exploited.
lead_paragraph: New legislation would arm returning veterans with information about schools and job training, and curb abuses by aggressive marketers.

headline.seo: A Good Education With the G.I. Bill
headline.main: A Good Education With the G.I. Bill
headline.print_headline: A Good Education With the G.I. Bill
